doc.field: Series C: Phoebe Dayton Gardiner Horsford
Series C: Phoebe Dayton Gardiner Horsford
Horsford, Cornelia Conway Felton (Nellie): Cambridge, MA; Bay Shore, Bellport, & Shelter Island, NY
Horsford, Cornelia Conway Felton (Nellie): Cambridge, MA; Bay Shore, Bellport, & Shelter Island, NY
1885 September 28; 1886 July 8 - August 19; 1891 June 28 & August 28; undated, circa 1880 - 1899
11 Letters, 9 Envelopes with Notation, Postage, 4 Western Union Telegraph Forms

Addressed To: "My darling Mamma," "Mrs. [Eben Norton] Horsford, [Phoebe Dayton Gardiner], 27 Craigie Street, Cambridge, MA," "Curtis Hotel, Lenox, MA," "Ocean House," "Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island, NY"
Sent From: "Cornelia [Conway Felton Horsford], 27 Craigie Street, Cambridge, MA," "Bay Shore, NY," "Bellport, NY," "Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island, NY," [Daughter of Phoebe Dayton Gardiner Horsford]

In Reference To: Family / Friendship / Personal / Social / Travel; Archibald Haven, Dr. Benjamin Nicoll, Jonas Bowditch, Mr. Baxter, Mr. Cushing, Mr. Havens Payne, Mr. Livingston, Miss Bissell, N.P. Dickerson, Winfield Cartwright; Cousin Lizzie, Mr. Luce, New London, CT, Newport, RI; Charles Dana, Edith Grinnell, Mrs. Bond, Mrs. Day; Grandpa Gardiner's Funeral
Horsford, Cornelia Conway Felton (Nellie): Cambridge, MA; Bay Shore, Bellport, & Shelter Island, NY: 1885 September 28; 1886 July 8 - August 19; 1891 June 28 & August 28; undated, circa 1880 - 1899
